title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a bowl, beat the eggs and mix in grated Parmesan cheese.
Cook the bacon until crispy and chop it into small pieces.
Drain the pasta and mix it with the egg and cheese mixture.
Add the bacon and black pepper, then serve immediately.
